caption.p: Masks and respirators based on EU standards: ( a) medical mask; ( b) filtering facepiece respirator; ( c) elastomeric respirator; ( d) filtering facepiece respirator with expiratory valve; ( e) powered and supplied air respirator; ( f) atmosphere-supplying respirator.
